name: Black Feather Fan
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Tengus/New Racial Rules/Tengu Magic Items/Black Feather Fan

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, gust of wind, whispering wind, wind wall

sections.body: This elaborate fan is made with a dozen black feathers set into a metal handle embossed with a stylized crest. The bearer can use it to create a gust of wind, whispering wind, or wind wall. The fan's effects can be used 3 times per day, in any combination.
sections.name: Description
